column4: I'm attempting to use mkinitrd to include a driver for my IDE controller so I can boot my system. I'm building it in the LiveCD environment, and chrooting into my system. mkinitrd is segfaulting after about ten minutes per execution. Anyone have any ideas?
thanks. That makes me want to scream that I found nothing about that in the past 36 hours.
i learned that the hard way to... ;)
